GenAiFunction.description:
Retrieve metadata about objects, fields and relationships in the org.
USAGE GUIDELINES: IMPORTANT: This tool MUST be used before executing any SOQL queries to: - Validate object existence and accessibility - Verify field names and data types - Check relationship structures - Ensure proper query construction
Operation Modes: - allObjects: Lists custom objects only, sorted alphabetically - objectDetails: Returns field details for specified objects including: * Field API Name * Data Type * Reference Objects (for lookup/master-detail) * Relationship Name
Best Practices: - Use allObjects for broad data model exploration - Use objectDetails for specific query planning - Always verify relationship fields before joins - Check field types for proper query filters - Validate object access before querying - Consider field-level security - Maximum 10 objects per request recommended - Case-insensitive object name matching - Returns empty response for inaccessible objects
